overview: X.Org, also known as X Server, is an open-source implementation of the X Window System that provides the framework for graphical user interfaces in Unix-like operating systems. It serves as the display server handling user input, window management, and graphics rendering for X applications, enabling graphical desktop environments to function.
core_features: Window display and management for GUI applications
Graphics rendering and input event handling
Support for multiple displays and multi-monitor setups
Integration with desktop environments and X applications
